phrases: Even though it is easy to say I love you
when you stand in front of me
my personality stands up and gets in my way.
I can usually pull through with my assertiveness
that is just how I am.
But no matter how hard I try, I cannot break the wall that is between us.
I want you to realise my feelings.
So I always send a gaze
of I really love you your way
After meeting you, I finally realised
that I am really clumsy when it comes to love.
The scars from love that I would almost forgotten
have started to ache all of a sudden.
Someday, like how I normally would...
I must say I love you, or else I will become even weaker.
On the nights I cannot sleep
Within the vast world, a single seed
and put out a fruit that was still unripe.
The fruit that I wish would turn orange soon
The ideals and dreams just swell -
Today, I tried eating an orange
but it was so sour I cried.
I could not leave it behind like I have been
I love it I feel like crying.
I love it I love it.
The Road We Must Advance On
I wish to find a job.
You do not need to, really!
People are eating, so do not do it!
It is better to see it with your own eyes than to hear about it!
Hey, why are you girls screaming?
Speaking of which, Valentine's is nearly here.
I doubt these festive youngsters will listen to anything I say.
Those lies will not work on me!
You plan to make out while I am not paying attention, right?
Doing such indecent things at school...
You know, it is really pointless to give or receive chocolate at school.
School is a place to learn.
W-We are being lectured by Haruta...
Takasu-kun, Aisaka-san, please come to the interview room after school.
Takasu-kun, you still cannot turn in your career assessment?
And Aisaka-san, you have not even turned the one from first semester in...
I am sorry, I am still discussing it with my family.
Your mother wants you to go to college, right?
My mother has always been a hard worker, but sometimes she pushes herself too much.
I do not want to be a burden anymore,
so I am not planning on going to college.
That is what I wish for.
So Aisaka-san, what is your reason for not turning it in?
I come from a rich family, so I will not ever need to work.
That is also why I do not need to study.
Plus, there is nothing I want to do.
Even if I do not go to college -
It is just that you will be on your own for the rest of your life.
You cannot just blame stuff on others.
No one will take responsibility for you.
That is why I want you two to carefully think it through.
Takasu-kun, you have not gone against your mother's intentions, have you?
After you have finished filling it out, bring it to the staff room.
The rest of my life, huh?
Hey, that is the career assessment form -
I do not need something like that.
It is impossible for me to think about my future.
I cannot even recognise myself right now.
I have always, always denied my present self.
What should I do to avoid it?
How can I know what I want to do later when I do not even know what I want to do right now?
There is one thing I want to do!
I want to fall in love normally!
Y-You do not even have someone -
I do not even know who it is.
I wanted to be born into a normal family, then raised as a normal good girl,
and then have a normal encounter with a guy, and become friends normally.
I wanted to fall in love normally like that...
Why are you using past tense?
I told you, it is impossible.
I mean, the conditions are already wrong.
I am not normal at all.
What do you mean by normal?
What is right, and what is wrong?
Who is there to decide those things?
Hold it, why are you suddenly lecturing me?
I am going home, I do not give a damn about that.
But Kawashima, think about it one more -
I do not have time to think about it anymore.
What are you doing standing there?
What do you want to do to my shoe?
Why are you trying to set a record for long throws at a time like this?
Why were you called to the staff room?
I said I would not model the school uniform for a school information pamphlet.
I just do not want to do it.
I do not even know how much longer I will be at this school.
Do not tell me that your fight with Kushieda -
No, a trivial person like Kushieda Minori could not have an influence on my life.
Then, why did you say that?
To be honest, I planned to leave after the first semester.
News about the stalker thing has died down too.
I have never heard you mention -
I decided I wanted to stay here a bit longer.
I wanted to be with you guys tomorrow,
or even the day after tomorrow...
I watched Taiga get hurt, and understood her pain.
I thought that, since I understood her,
I would save her if no one else did, or something like that...
Now I realise that everything would sort itself out if I left.
My part-time job at the cake store too...
They even made a cute uniform for me...
Just rest, and do not worry about anything.
Oh, do not worry about her.
Thank god, seeing her faint from my window scared the heck out of -
I am going to buy something for Yasuko to eat.
You left your cell phone, wallet, and key!
Get a grip on yourself, idiot!
You are acting all weird now!
If I was not so useless,
Yasuko would have more faith and trust in me...
She would rely on me more, and then things like this would never happen...
It is all right, I am a super mum!
Tomorrow and the day after tomorrow are the busiest times because of Valentine's Day.
I am sorry, she really cannot come.
I do not think I will be able to find a substitute at this time...
I want to do something for Ya-chan.
I was fired from my part-time job at the cake shop?
I am sure I will be able to find another job.
Say it with a stronger voice!
I mean, your face was not born for advertising food.
Oh, you guys are really working!
Haruta-kun, which one do you like?
They say if you buy big ones, bad things will happen.
Then, I will take that big one.
May I have this one, please?
She is not my sister, she is my girlfriend.
Let us go to a warm place.
Well, I just happened to pass by...
Oh yeah, has anyone else come by?
For example, Ami-chan, or even Nanako-sama...
I was just wondering if Kihara will give Kitamura chocolate, or something...
I am fine with it either way.
I mean, look Taiga, you care about that, right?
What do you mean by that?
Besides, why does Kihara Maya buying chocolate for Kitamura-kun concern you?
So people who realise their feelings after fighting really do exist...
I do not think it is strange at all.
A male's stamen and a female's pistil...
There is something wrong with your brain!
What is going on with him?
We will be scolded if we mess around anymore.
I guess there is no other choice than to summon the lethal weapon.
I thought you were by yourself.
Do not make me do weird things.
I am beautiful, so I naturally grab people's attention.
That is why you should take this and say, I love the chocolate here! out loud.
Why would I do such a lame thing?
It is all right, Stupid Chi'.
Oh yeah, how about you buy one for yourself?
You could give it to Minorin to make up with her.
Contrary to popular belief, I care about you.
You want to get on good terms with Minorin, but it is not working out for you.
The shaking delicate heart of a Chihuahua -
Hey, why are you making assump -
If you are embarrassed, I will call Minorin for you.
My, Valentine's Day came just in time.
Hey, is not that Kawashima Ami-chan?
Is she buying chocolate at that place?
Even my model friends say it is good.
I want to buy the same kind as Ami-chan's!
Wow, she can be helpful from time to time.
Yes, I will be right there!
Excuse me, I would like this one.
You really like chasing after people, do not you?
You have potential to be a stalker.
Not just from me, but from a lot of other things too.
Listen, I do not think it would be better if you left.
Besides, you will disappoint everyone if you leave.
You really do not get it.
Look, Taiga cannot handle it by herself.
Actually, I would be happy even if it was not everyone.
I do not get it myself either.
I will be counting on you tomorrow!
We have reached our target already, so it is pointless to buy the rest.
It is all right, I am going to give them out.
Yeah, I caused a lot of trouble for people on the trip.
Like Kitamura-kun, Minorin, and the Stupid Chi'.
If I gave you chocolate, would you be happy?
I would not be human if getting chocolate from you did not make me happy.
Then, I will try my best.
Just giving you guys store-bought chocolate is rude,
so I will try to do something nice with it.
Hopefully I can make everyone happy.
You are going to the shop already?
I am all healthy now, so it will be fine.
Why did you bring us all here?
so I made some chocolate to say thanks.
It will be such a waste to eat it!
Was not that the chocolate you were selling yesterday?
You are really good at telling lies -
The wrapping was nice so I reused it, but I made everything inside.
I will not help you with stuff like that anymore.
I know you went to save me during the field trip.
You do not need to be so formal...
I will come to save you whenever you are in trouble!
I put the most effort into this one.
It is all right, you were the person who carried me from the bottom of the cliff, after all.
Crap, I did not tell Kushieda to -
I wonder if my eyes were all white...
I really did not expect that to happen!
I rolled down like this, and there were some weird noises in my head.
I finally found out what fainting feels like.
I felt like I blurted out things that I was not supposed to say.
When I regained my consciousness, I started to panic...
What do you think you blurted out?
I really, really cannot say it!
Anyway, it was just my delusion!
It is something that no one should know!
I will be ruined if people find out.
I will not be able to live anymore because it is something really, really messed up.
You did not hear it, right?
Yeah, I heard nothing, right Takasu?
No one heard anything, it is all right.
You think everything will be all right if you pretend you did not hear it?!
Taiga, you are glad that no one heard it because that solves everything, right?!
Takasu-kun was the one who saved you, but he just did not tell you!
He did not tell you because of what you said, right?!
Why cannot you just be honest for once?!
Do you think it will be all right if you let Aisaka run away?
What do you see me as?
I am Minorin, your best friend, right?!
Did not you say you like me?
I do not think you are the kind of person to blame others for your inability to go after what you want!
Or are you someone like that?!
I just want you to be happy...
I just want the Minorin I love to be happy...
My happiness does not depend on anyone but me!
This is all we can do.
Bad things will happen if you do not chase after her.
Takasu-kun, I will chase after Taiga.
I am not done talking with her yet.
What are you doing to do?
What am I going to do?
What will happen if I chase after her?
What will I do after I find out how Taiga feels?
She obviously wanted to hide it...
Hey Taiga, it is about to snow.
I think I left a lot of things out.
